title: "Sculptura" rotary-dial telephone
text: Popularly known as the "doughnut" phone, this model took the "cradle" style one step further by creating a complete circular form.  It was produced in both rotary-dial and push-button models in a wide range of colors to complement the decor of home interiors.
description: circular shaped phone with open center; bright yellow; rotary dial
creditline: Gift of funds from Kathleen Bendel
